message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE 

This paper is related to natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning, specifically in the area of named entity transliteration and classification. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which covers topics related to NLP and computational linguistics. 

The paper also involves information retrieval (IR) techniques, as it deals with matching English named entities to their Arabic transliterations. Therefore, cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is another likely sub-category. 

The use of machine learning algorithms for named entity classification also suggests that cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) are possible sub-categories. 

Finally, the focus on Arabic named entities and the use of parallel translation corpora may suggest cs.NE (Networks and Internet Architecture) as a possible sub-category, as this field covers topics related to multilingual information processing and cross-lingual communication.
